original_text: They did not take proper care of you on the day that you were born. They did not wash you properly. They did not cut your cord. They did not put salt or oil on your skin. They did not put cloths around you.
korean_text: 네가 난 것을 말하건대 네가 날 때에 네 배꼽 줄을 자르지 아니하였고 너를 물로 씻어 정결하게 하지 아니하였고 네게 소금을 뿌리지 아니하였고 너를 강보로 싸지도 아니하였나니

sentences.original_text: They did not take proper care of you
on the day that you were born
They did not wash you properly
They did not cut your cord
They did not put salt or oil on your skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신의 피부에 소금이나 기름을 바르지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They did not put cloths around you
